definition: to touch/to come in contact with/to feel/to be affected by/to catch fire/to burn/(coll.) to fall asleep/(after a verb) hitting the mark/succeeding in
aspect particle indicating action in progress
surname Mo/abbr. for 墨西哥[Mo4 xi1 ge1], Mexico
ink stick/China ink/CL:塊|块[kuai4]/corporal punishment consisting of tattooing characters on the victim's forehead

sentences.english: The first touch of his brush is very far from the complete idea.
sentences.chinese: 画家动手着墨的第一笔远非完整的构思。

sentences.english: The compiler seems to be primarily for faster JRuby-to-JRuby interaction.
sentences.chinese: 编译器主要还是在加速JRuby本身的交互上着墨。

sentences.english: The net line Gun and rubber are tiny to adjust to equip and make Mo more even.
sentences.chinese: 网纹辊与橡胶间有微调装置，使着墨更均匀。

sentences.english: Ink the roller with print the version the auto ink with escape from.
sentences.chinese: 墨辊与印版自动着墨与脱离。

sentences.english: As one sits astride a black unicorn.

definition: surname Mo/abbr. for 墨西哥[Mo4 xi1 ge1], Mexico
ink stick/China ink/CL:塊|块[kuai4]/corporal punishment consisting of tattooing characters on the victim's forehead
to touch up (a piece of writing)/to add details (to a painting)
to trace over/to take a copy (of a calligraphy, a painting etc)/(fig.) to describe/to portray
the tip of a writing brush/vigor of style in writing/stroke/touch
to arrange/to spread out/to narrate in detail/to describe at great length/to elaborate
vigor of strokes in calligraphy or drawing/vigor of style in literary composition
